subtitle: A fishy, tasty snack that is so quick to make. Try to use naturally smoked haddock or cod.

method.text: Poach haddock in water for 10 min. Drain, skin and flake.
Meanwhile, heat oil and cook tomatoes for about 2 min.
In a non-stick pan, cook eggs over a medium heat, stirring occasionally, until just cooked. Fold in the cooked tomatoes and haddock and heat through. Gently stir in the creme fraiche.
Serve on toast with grilled, halved tomatoes.

title: Tomatoes on toast with creamy smoked haddock
